data.text: @healingfemme @SeeMiaRoll yes, i wish there was more content addressing the intersections of race and disability--there is a feedback section so I'm leaving a comment raising this! https://t.co/WdXP635PB8
@SeeMiaRoll @tsengputterman Lolz prob not...i so rarely see disability discussed in Asian American spaces...ppl only seem to discuss race and maybe one other identity at a time 🤔
